Comments: Name of the project underwhich the experiment was carried out
Encripted vessel identifier. ID encrypted so that no-one can map the ID to the real vessel
Identifier of the trip for a given project and vessel
Sequential numbering of hauls. Starting by 1 for each new trial
Identify the subgear (for twin protocol) or the gear (for paired/unpaired protocol): STD for Standard gear or TEST for experimental gear
The intended usage at the time of landing. This should match the same field in SL record.
Commercial sorting category in the given scale.This should match the same field in SL record.
If different subsampling is applied within the catch (e.g. in the DIS fraction).This should match the same field in SL record.
Sex category.This should match the same field in SL record.
Whole weight of the stratum (Species / Catch_Category / Size_Category) in gramme. Decimals are not allowed?
Weight of subsample in grammes of the corresponding stratum (Species / Catch_Category) for the measurement (HL table)
